reminder.bump_message: Thank you {user_mention} for bumping our server! We will remind you in two hours to bump again.
reminder.reminder_message: {to_ping_mention} It is time to bump the server again!', 'Bump our server by typing /bump!'

bump_miss_reminder.message: {to_ping_mention} Woops! It seems like you missed bumping our server! Please bump again to support us!

counter.bump_message: We have been bumped **{count}** times and your contribution is **{contribution_pct}%**! Thank you for your support!
